alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 6:41PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central St. Johns and southeastern Duval Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 641 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Durbin, or 9 miles east of Fruit Cove, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Durbin, Palm Valley, Sawgrass and Nocatee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
